title: How can engineer mode be removed from a phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: the place where you got your phone could do it. Thyically, you cannot get an engineer cell phone unless you work for a cell company. That’s how I got mine, and when I left the company I got to keep the phone but with no more engineering and a new phone number. Engineering cell phones show the tower you are connected to, the amount of traffic, and other neat stuff.
What is an engineer mode in a phone?? You may have phrased your question incorrectly… Try again..
